title: unable to comment. "so sad...you are not authorized"
body: I usually don't comment on official and board posts but recently, I felt the need to comment on the academy adventures page. when I tried to post my comment, it just showed a picture of Amumu and said "so sad...you are not authorized" Cant anyone please help? {{champion:103}}

replies.body:
This often occurs if you're posting too quickly or if the platform has issues authenticating you. You should be able to resolve this by [**clearing your browser data**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) and logging into the Boards again.

Let me know if this worked!
What if it's happening from a phone?
I logged off the sight, restarted my computer and it worked. thank you
